mapper.delete: delete from basket where mem_id=#{mem_id} and pro_no=#{pro_no}
mapper.select: select b.mem_id, b.pro_no, b.basket_pro_count, p.pro_name, p.pro_price from basket b left outer join pro p on p.pro_no = b.pro_no where mem_id=#{mem_id}
select * from basket where mem_id=#{mem_id} and pro_no=#{pro_no}
mapper.insert: insert into basket (pro_no, basket_date, basket_pro_count, mem_id) values (#{pro_no}, sysdate, #{basket_pro_count}, #{mem_id})
